summary: Request to add an `#execute_workflow` method to the Ruby SDK Client. This issue became obsolete during the SDK rewrite and is no longer applicable.
userImpact: Users would have a direct method to execute workflows from the Client instance.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this issue is no longer applicable to the current version.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
